title: Crash error 183.
body:
Im getting sick of the error 183. I had so meny leaverbusters and crashes in champ select so innoying!!
Does anyone knows how to solve this please???

Greetings Rasklad

replies.body:
Yeah that sounds pretty annoying, and I want to help!   For now, I recommend sticking to custom games to troubleshoot so you prevent further leaverbuster penalties.  

This error might be stemming from a rendering issue if you're using Nvidia or  if you're running 32-bit OS instead of 64.  Start off with the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers are working properly.

If the issue persists, upgrading to 64 should resolve the issue,[ per this guide](https://www.windowscentral.com/how-upgrade-32-bit-64-bit-version-windows-10)!

Edit:  Made some adjsustments
Updated the thread as I got more details about the specific error.  :D
